idea: ANSSI WELLNESS CENTER is providing the proven breakthrough treatment, Spinal Decompression Treatment, to the people of India. Spinal Decompression Treatment is a progressive neck and back pain treatment system that slowly lengthens and decompresses the spine, which releases the stress within the discs. Spinal Decompression Treatment is a safe, cost-effective, non-surgical treatment that offers new hope for the millions of people who suffer from lower back pain every day. Dr.Joseph Cammarata (USA) and his team have been providing Spinal Decompression Treatment Therapy longer than any physician in the world. Dr.Cammarata and his team celebrate a proud history and commitment to the patients for whom they care, and for those whose lives have been changed forever.
name: ANSSI WELLNESS CENTER LLP

idea:
Thatism is into app based technology development. Currently working on two app both which are pending approval in the IOS and Google playstore listings. 


One app is a relationship and soulmatching app developed with the idea of keeping the Indian ethos in mind. This app is for Indians globally and will also include new age technology developments such as NFTs and blockchain


The second app is in the the news aggregator category. It consolidates news about everything crypto, web3.0, Metaverse, blockchain and puts it on a singular platform, in a short and crisp format. It allows the user to do a single swipe action and go the website where the news is originating from.
name: Thatism Techserve Private Limited

idea:
Trendy paws is a pet grooming SPA on wheels service started by pet lover Disha Shrivastava.

The ideation of the company came from her real-life experience where Disha experienced inconvenience taking the dogs for their grooming. After conducting a survey she found out that this isn’t just her problem but it is a problem for all the pet lovers and apart from the problem it became risky to take pets on crowded commercial roads, crossing the roads, etc.

Trendy Paws offers professional pet grooming services by experts on the doorsteps. People can book the services online through the trendy paws website or messenger services which also offer easy and cash-less payment options.

Trendy Paws has started with grooming services and regular vaccination for the pets, going forward, we will also offer quality food and accessories for the pets. We are also in process of developing a researched-backed app for pet training. It will be hyper-personalized according to the breeds and characteristics of particular pets.
name: TRENDY PAWS ON WHEELS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are M/s. MRJ APPARELS, a garment Manufacturing Company Based out of Tarapur, Maharashtra. Established in the year 2018 we commenced our Commercial and Production Journey from 1st of April, 2019 and have been on a steady and fast growing pace ever since. We are manufacturers of Corporate Uniforms, Workman Uniforms, T-shirt, Shirts, Pant, Boiler Suits, Lab Coats, Aprons, Hand Gloves, Shoe Cover, Causal Wear, Formal Wear, Ethnic Wear, Blazer, Suits and All Types of Specialty Garments, Clothing Items and All Kinds of Personal Safety and Other Type of Garment and Apparels. We have incorporated a Team of Specialist that are highly skilled and effective in such Quality Production which have allowed us to achieve some of India Top Clientele from all Sector of the Industry including Nuclear Power Corporation of India Limited.
name: MRJ APPARELS

idea: Gomodular Private Limited is in the business of designing, selling, and installing modular kitchens, furniture, wardrobes, etc. We started our business in the Mumbai market and as the times pass, we spread our business to other cities too. We understand every need and design the customer’s dream kitchen with world handpicked class designs. We are here to help you design and realize the kitchen and wardrobe of your dreams. We sourced semi-furnished materials from the established factories and assembled the factory made-made furniture at the site.  We can deliver a ready to use a product to the customers at their sites, following these procedures.,
name: GOMODULAR PRIVATE LIMITED
